Structs in vsip::impl

Block_copy_from_ptr
Block_copy_from_ptr<Dim,Block,Order,PackType,CmplxFmt,false>
Block_copy_to_ptr

Utility class to copy block data into/out-of of regular memory.

Rt_block_copy_from_ptr
Rt_block_copy_from_ptr_impl

Implementation class to copy block data from pointer to regular memory, with layout determined at run-time.

Rt_block_copy_from_ptr_impl<Dim,Block,false,false>

Specialization for const blocks (with non-complex value type).

Rt_block_copy_from_ptr_impl<Dim,Block,false,true>

Specialization for blocks with non-complex value_types.

Rt_block_copy_from_ptr_impl<Dim,Block,true,false>

Specialization for const blocks (with complex value type).

Rt_block_copy_from_ptr_impl<Dim,Block,true,true>

Specializations for blocks with complex value_types.

Rt_block_copy_to_ptr

Utility classes to copy block data to/from a pointer to regular memory, with layout determined at run-time.

Rt_block_copy_to_ptr_impl
Rt_block_copy_to_ptr_impl<Dim,Block,false>

Specialization for blocks with non-complex value_types.

Rt_block_copy_to_ptr_impl<Dim,Block,true>

Specialization for blocks with complex value_types.
